data.text: @CamilleCNY @Michell12008971 @CEJRyanMcMahon My son is in college. He will continue to mask too. He goes to OCC. It's only a matter of time before they shed their masks.
@sarah_anne_660 @Michell12008971 @CEJRyanMcMahon My kids will still wear their masks. I will be furious if they bring it home because of this, after two years of avoiding it.
@CamilleCNY @Michell12008971 @CEJRyanMcMahon Exactly! I think it is such a bad decision.
@Michell12008971 @sarah_anne_660 @CEJRyanMcMahon Can you imagine leaving seatbelt wearing up to children?
@sarah_anne_660 @DHN20 @CEJRyanMcMahon Yes I had an ablation there & they are the best! She will be in the best hands!! ♥️

@sarah_anne_660 @DHN20 @CEJRyanMcMahon I know. They need 1-2 (really prob 2 at upstate) house ICU beds for pts that code or go south in house. Plus any traumas/burns -> they all have to go to upstate.
@sarah_anne_660 @DHN20 @CEJRyanMcMahon Yes they do & that’s the best place for the heart! From the cath lab to EP lab to open heart surgery - that’s the best place & she will be in good hands!
@sarah_anne_660 @DHN20 @CEJRyanMcMahon Here’s todays # at upstate- literally this is a mess. https://t.co/ZpKkvs4ihq
